## Importing packages

```{r}
install.packages("readr")
library(readr)
```

## Loading data

Loading the adenoma_adenocarcinoma file

```{r}
ASCO <- read_tsv("~/project29_git/_raw/frequent-mutations.adenoma_adenocarcinoma.tsv")
```

Loading the squamous_cell_carcinoma file

```{r}
SCC <- read_tsv("~/project29_git/_raw/frequent-mutations.squamous_cell_carcinoma.tsv")
```

Loading the meta data

```{r}
metaData <- read_tsv("~/project29_git/_raw/survival-plot1.tsv")
```
